title: Schuerholz on Braves' season: 'It's a tough year'
text:
Braves president of baseball operations John Hart and team president John Schuerholz sat with the Braves broadcast team Thursday night.
You can see (above) what the two Braves officials say what they believe went right and what went wrong in 2015.
Schuerholz made no excuses for the results this year - the team is 64-95 entering the final homestand - but said the team's moves made by Hart and new general manager John Coppolella will see some benefits in 2016 and beyond. Hart deatiled the team's focus this winter, which includes help in the rotation and bullpen.
Curtis Compton / www.ajc.com Braves president John Schuerholz (right) credits John Hart with making moves that will improve the team.
